nodes.text: The Siskeen theater was one of the six theaters of operations of the Outer Rim Sieges, which took place during the final stages of the Clone Wars.
The Siskeen theater was located in the Outer Rim Territories, along the Corellian Run. This field of operations was named after the key Separatist world of Siskeen.
In the Siskeen theater, Republic forces were deployed from Rothana and Excarga to clear the outer Corellian Run of Separatist units.
